<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Natural Illusionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=997) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Illusion Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=31)

</column>

---

By drawing upon the First World’s magic, you can siphon a portion of that malleable world to create a convincing illusion. Once per day, you can cast [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [_item facade_](/Spells.aspx?ID=166), or [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356). At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.
name: Natural Illusionist
